# Requirement
1. Implementation of LR algorithm

2. Implementation of GD. 

3. Comparison of BGD, SGD, mini-batch GD, Memotum, NAG


#Reference:
1. http://www.chokkan.org/publication/survey/logistic_regression_sgd.html
